queries.description: Using braces in initializers of objects and subobjects improves code readability and clarifies intent.
queries.name: The initializer for an aggregate or union shall be enclosed in braces

RULE-9-2.title: The initializer for an aggregate or union shall be enclosed in braces

queries.description: An array object or a subobject of an array shall be explicitly initialized if any other object in that array is explicitly initialized.
queries.name: Arrays shall not be partially initialized

RULE-9-3.title: Arrays shall not be partially initialized

queries.description: Repeated initialization of an element in an object can lead to side-effects or may signal a logic error.
queries.name: An element of an object shall not be initialized more than once

RULE-9-4.title: An element of an object shall not be initialized more than once
